programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Owls engage the Bobcats in the First Responder Bowl. Texas State entered the season as one of three FBS programs to not have played in a bowl game. Rice's Luke McCaffrey, brother of San Francisco 49ers star Christian, made 12 TD grabs this year.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: UNLV lines up against Kansas in the Guaranteed Rate Bowl. The Rebels, who have played in just one playoff game across the past 23 seasons, won nine contests for the first time since 1984. The Jayhawks seek their first bowl-game victory since 2008.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Golden Gophers and their good grades face a test in the Quick Lane Bowl against the Falcons. Minnesota was the only five-win program needed to complete the 82-team bowl lineup. The Gophers won the tiebreaker via their Academic Progress Rate.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Owls engage the Bobcats in the First Responder Bowl. Texas State entered the season as one of three FBS programs to not have played in a bowl game. Rice's Luke McCaffrey, brother of San Francisco 49ers star Christian, made 12 TD grabs this year.

The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Green Wave ride into a Military Bowl outing against the Hokies. Tulane had won 10 straight games before falling 26-14 to SMU in the American Athletic Conference title game. Tulane's Makhi Hughes paced freshmen nationwide with 1,290 rushing yards.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Mountaineers and Tar Heels enter the Duke's Mayo Bowl going in different directions despite both being 8-4. West Virginia won four of its last five contests, totaling 76 points in winning its past two. North Carolina is mired in a two-game slide.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Aggies (7-5) and No. 20 Cowboys (9-4) meet in the Texas Bowl for the second time in five years. Texas A&M topped Oklahoma State 24-21 in the 2019 game. The Cowboys come off a 49-21 loss to the CFP-bound Longhorns in the Big 12 championship game.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Eagles stay close to home as they play the No. 24 Mustangs in the Fenway Bowl. Boston College's campus is about four miles from Fenway Park. SMU, the American Athletic Conference champion, has won nine straight. BC has dropped three in a row.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Hurricanes (7-5) come up against the Scarlet Knights (6-6) in the Pinstripe Bowl from Yankee Stadium. This is the first meeting between the schools since both were members of the Big East in 2003. Miami is 11-0 against Rutgers all-time.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 18 Wolfpack (9-3) match up with the No. 25 Wildcats (8-4) in the Pop-Tarts Bowl. NC State has won this bowl three times, most recently in 2010. Kansas State senior quarterback Will Howard has accounted for 34 touchdowns this season.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 12 Sooners line up against the No. 14 Wildcats in the Alamo Bowl. Oklahoma, Alamo champions in 2021, qualified for a 25th consecutive postseason with a 10-2 regular season. Arizona won six straight contests to end a six-year playoff drought.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 22 Tigers appear in a 19th straight postseason as they play the Wildcats in the Gator Bowl. Clemson prevailed in its last four games after a 4-4 start. The Tigers won eight of their last 11 bowls, and two national titles during that span.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: A Liberty Bowl rematch sees the Tigers (9-3) play the Cyclones (7-5) on Memphis' home field. Iowa State marched into Simmons Bank Liberty Stadium in 2017, defeating Memphis 21-20. Running back Blake Watson (MEM) totaled 17 TDs in the regular season.

programme.desc: The Red Raiders play host to the No. 13 Ducks. Oregon's offense set the modern school record for points scored in a game during an 81-7 rout of Portland State on Sept. 2. Texas Tech dropped its season opener versus Wyoming in double overtime.

programme.title: Greatest Games: College Football
programme.desc: From Amon G. Carter Stadium in Fort Worth, Texas on Sept. 2, 2023.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: A marquee Pac-12 matchup pits the No. 18 Trojans (6-1, 4-0) against the No. 14 Utes (5-1, 2-1) in Week 8. Utah eked out a one-point home victory over USC last season, then clobbered the Trojans 47-24 to claim the 2022 Pac-12 championship.

programme.desc: A tribute to John Madden's groundbreaking career - centered largely on the time after his Hall of Fame coaching career ended.

programme.desc: EJ Tackett meets Anthony Simonsen in the WSOB XIV World Championship Finals. Tackett, a 20-time PBA Tour winner, seeks his fifth victory and second major title this season. From Milwaukee.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 8 Trojans try to stay perfect against the Buffaloes. USC has won all 16 meetings, averaging 39.9 points in 11 Pac-12 get-togethers. Colorado comes off its first loss in the Deion Sanders era, a 42-6 shellacking at then-No. 10 Oregon.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Future conference rivals meet to begin the season as the Buffaloes visit the No. 17 Horned Frogs. New Colorado head coach Deion Sanders has revamped the roster with the hopes of avoiding results like last year's opener, when TCU thumped CU 38-13.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Wolverines and Buckeyes square off as 11-0 teams for the second straight season. A Big Ten championship game berth and an all-but-certain spot in the College Football Playoff await the winner. Michigan won the last two meetings.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Red Raiders play host to the No. 13 Ducks. Oregon's offense set the modern school record for points scored in a game during an 81-7 rout of Portland State on Sept. 2. Texas Tech dropped its season opener versus Wyoming in double overtime.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: A marquee Pac-12 matchup pits the No. 18 Trojans (6-1, 4-0) against the No. 14 Utes (5-1, 2-1) in Week 8. Utah eked out a one-point home victory over USC last season, then clobbered the Trojans 47-24 to claim the 2022 Pac-12 championship.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Washington and Washington State play for the final Apple Cup as members of the Pac-12. The undefeated Huskies, who have already clinched a spot in the Pac-12 title game, lead the series 75-33-6. Washington moves to the Big Ten next season.

programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: Surprise packages meet as the Rockets host the Pacers. Houston's emergence as a playoff contender has been aided by a 12-2 mark at home this season. All five Rockets starters are averaging at least 12 points in those games, led by Jalen Green's 18.6.

programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Hornets embark on an excursion that takes them into the new year, starting with the Clippers. The Hornets are 3-9 on the road in 2023-24. The Clippers have won 10 straight meetings with the Hornets, and not lost to Charlotte at home since 2009.

programme.desc: The Pistons try to break up the Celtics' perfect home mark. Boston is 14-0 at TD Garden in 2023-24, the second-longest streak at home to begin a season in franchise history. The C's have put together 21 consecutive regular-season victories in Boston.

programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Warriors and Heat, fresh off separate Christmas Day commitments, hit the floor in San Francisco. Golden State plays seven in a row at the Chase Center, where it has taken eight consecutive outings. Miami last won at Golden State in 2020.
